name: Hello Penguin 2 HD
description:
HELLO PENGUIN 2 HD

Reality and unreality collide. The fine line between what is and what is not begins to tear. Your heart is beating out of your chest.

Yo, It's Penguin. Yo, It's Penguin. Hello Penguin 2 HD is the all new HDquel to Hello Penguin 2 (SD).

Attempt to stop it, we dare you!

Hellopengu.in

FEATURES
  • PENGUIN
  • Boss Fights
  • Cheat Codes
  • Another boss??
  • Trash
  • One or more endings
  • 30 to 90 minutes playtime
HELLO TEAM
  • Noxid
  • HyMyNameIsMatt
  • +w+
  • Brabbit

Poster by Taxiderby

The Hello Penguin 2 HD Soundtrack is available on BandCamp: https://plusw.bandcamp.com/album/broken-soul-in-the-reality-hole-hp2hd-original-...
